name: AGEod's American Civil War: 1861-1865 – The Blue and the Gray
name_original: AGEod's American Civil War: 1861-1865 – The Blue and the Gray
description:
AGEod's American Civil War: 1861-1865 – The Blue and the Gray is a strategy game developed by Ageod. It came out on 12-04-2007. It was published by AGEod.
AGEod's American Civil War: 1861-1865 – The Blue and the Gray is available on PC.
